description: With minimalist but still impactful style, their Men’s Everyday Exploration Merino Pocket Tee brings the comfort, durability, odor resistance, and thermoregulation you expect from responsibly sourced Merino wool. Plus, its fabric blends in hemp, for a more eco-conscious approach. For your next summertime BBQ or latte meetup, this tee will leave you feeling good and looking great.
name: Smartwool Everyday Exploration Merino Pocket Tee - Mens
